website_summaries.verdict: Choose these if your have sensitive skin or an average amount of oil.
pros: Lightly powdered sheets lift oil and leave a matte finish behind
Regular use leads to fewer breakouts
Pureness oil control blotting paper was launched by Shiseido
cons: Can be difficult to tell which side you are supposed to use

website_summaries.verdict: A set of 100 convenient blotting papers that help control oil throughout the day.
pros: For all skin types but ideal for those with oily skin
Helps eliminate excess sweat to prevent breakouts
cons: Some users report needing at least one blotting sheet per use

customer_reviews.title: and after years of not terrific results with the typical drug store oil sheets
customer_reviews.text: I tend to only leave reviews for miracle products, so count this as one. I have battled oily skin all my life, and after years of not terrific results with the typical drug store oil sheets, I read a review that recommended these. The magic touch for these is the powder included on the paper. Any of the typical sheets will remove oil, but these are amazing because these matte-ify as well along with removing oil, and I can't believe I didn't look for these sooner.
customer_reviews.author: aaadam84

customer_reviews.title: Helps control oily skin and acne!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for almost 20 years! I have very oily skin and adult acne, and these sheets help tremendously for both. I have tried other brands and other variants of the Shiseido blotting paper line, and always come back to these. Try if for 30 days, and you will be impressed; use twice a day for best results.
customer_reviews.author: tylerdurden

customer_reviews.title: Have used this product for more than 20 years
customer_reviews.text: Expensive? Yes, but the best oil control blotting paper I've ever used ... only one sheet is needed as opposed to 4 or 5 of another brand ... plus, the light film of powder gives my face a matte-finish look. I have been using this product for 20+ years and the only complain I have now is: Shiseido has been using a flimsier, lightweight paper for the past few years so the sheet tears easily.
customer_reviews.author: readMeMe

customer_reviews.title: One of many awesome Shiseido products!
customer_reviews.text: I have used these since I was maybe 21 and am now 45...when the makeup lady showed me how they worked, I was sold! I use them a few times a day to keep the oil away and my makeup looking fresh!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not BLUE, but PINK
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be for the original BLUE papers, but it was not. They were the NEW PINK papers, and I returned them right away.
customer_reviews.author: Animal

customer_reviews.title: Shine Be Gone
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of blotting papers but this one is the best. Absorbs oil and leaves a matte finish. I like the dispenser too - fits right into my little cosmetic bag!
customer_reviews.author: dsnr

customer_reviews.title: These blotting papers work!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried less expensive oil blotters, but they didnt work well. These blotters take away all the oily shine. It looks like I just applied my make-up as I look so fresh. Without these blotters, I may be washing my face and reapplying my makeup when I have plans later in the evening. No need when using these blotting papers/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best by far
customer_reviews.text: After 30 years of oily skin I have never found a better blotting paper. I guess I have bought 100 of these over the years, as well as trying out whatever is in Sephora and always come back to these. They work. Leave a nice dry finish but not powdery. If I use these daily I have fewer break outs.
customer_reviews.author: Bette D. Young

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product works for my oily skin and leaves no residue
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Best oil control blotters in the world!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The absolute best oil control blotters in the world!!!! Will never be without them. I always keep an extra package on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product.....been using it for years. Helps deal with my oily face throughout the day. I don't leave home without it.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Nunez

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: It is hard for me to tell which side I am supposed to use. Both sides look identical so I have to be checking which one has the powder. I wouldn't buy this again because I don't find it user-friendly
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Best Oil Blotting Sheets for Oily Skin
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Shiseido Pureness Oil Blotting Sheets for over a decade. First of all, they do not remove your makeup. Second of all, they do not aggravate skin allergies. Third of all, the packaging holds up to being taken in and out of my pocket. Last of all, they have a setting powder. Over time, the price keeps creeping up and I have tried to substitute them for a cheaper product, but so far, nothing can match it. They are the best oil sheets I have come across for oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: Honest_Words

customer_reviews.title: Shiseido blotters
customer_reviews.text: I've used Shiseido blotters for years and am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this product The paper is very ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on this product The paper is very thin, falls apart very easily, and for the money you can get four times as much with the CVS brand which is excellent and will not break
customer_reviews.author: Alina

customer_reviews.title: Arrived early which I was very glad about! Perfectly sealed and packaged
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early which I was very glad about! Perfectly sealed and packaged. I love these oil blotting sheets, my dermatologist recommended them to me and I have been in love with them ever since! Great for my oily skin, and the powder is great for reducing shine and making your skin look matte. Overall great prouduct, glad I purchased
customer_reviews.author: Kassandra azevedo

customer_reviews.title: Best plotting papers ever,  I have tried others.  Don’t bother.  Stick with these!  💯 A+++
customer_reviews.text: These are the absolute best blotting papers I have ever used for my face. I have been using these for years and have tried others. But, I get disappointed and always come back to these! Highly recommend. 💯 A+++ 👏
customer_reviews.author: Lissette Santana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to tuck into your purse or pocket
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to tuck into a purse when you live in the humid south
customer_reviews.author: Gina Treadgold

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Favorite blotting papers! Doesn't leave anything behind when blotting and they are the best out there.
customer_reviews.author: BeAn

customer_reviews.title: These are the best blotting tissues I've found
customer_reviews.text: These are the best blotting tissues I've found, and I've used a lot. The size is ideal and they do what they are supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Indiana Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Great product - does what its supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great to clean up my and my bridesmaids' makeup throughout the wedding! This now resides in my purse for everyday use. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: L. MacPeek

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love these sheets. I have been using these sheets for years and very satisfied. No white powder left on my skin, especially that I have a dark complexion.
customer_reviews.author: RSM

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Blotting paper, just pricey
customer_reviews.text: It works GREAT! More substantial than any other blotter paper I have tried. The only thing is that it is TRES pricey. If you're really looking for quality though, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: I buy other brands but always come back to these. I think they are the best on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty L.

customer_reviews.title: The Greatest for Oily or Semi-Oily Skins
customer_reviews.text: The greatest! Blots without smearing makeup to give a matte appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: These oil blotting papers are great. They take away the shine perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shine from the inside... not the outside.
customer_reviews.text: This product works! If you're like me, and by mid-day, look a bit "glossy," this is the perfect touch-up. It blots off excess oil and shine, without leaving you looking dry or flat.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: works well, but they're small
customer_reviews.text: these work great, but I wish they'd fold out to larger sized sheets
customer_reviews.author: Liz Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Absolute must have for me. I carry the little papers around with me and use twice a day--I do have excessively oily skin, but I think it would work well for anyone interested in controlling shine and working toward healthier skin. Lifts the oil away from the skin, doesn't just smush it into your pores.
customer_reviews.author: L. B. MASON

customer_reviews.title: Love the texture
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty oily skin and this is the best product I've tried that helps me control the shine without causing more breakouts. The oil lifts really well with the paper and slight powder coating. Sometimes I have to use 2 sheets if there's a lot of oil coming off. I like the feel of paper against my skin much more than the texture of the material used by Clearsil and Neutrogena.
customer_reviews.author: Genie

customer_reviews.title: Best blotting papaer ever
customer_reviews.text: Best blotting papar on the Market, loved it, been using for years!
customer_reviews.author: Bruno Z

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for blotting sheets, this is the one! Unlike cheaper brands, the Shiseido Pureness blotting sheets come with a powdery side (the side that opens up towards you like a book) that helps absorb the oil and thus making you shine-free. It doesn't leave any powder residue on your face either. It effectively mattifies nd leaves your skin feeling fresh. Yes it's pricey, but it's well worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny TD

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: The paper works, but the sheets are smaller than the ones I bought in Nordstrom. Wonder if it's real.
customer_reviews.author: Margarita

customer_reviews.title: Still THE best oil blotting paper!
customer_reviews.text: This is THE best oil blotting paper out there. I've been using it for years, always going back even though it's more expensive than others. The others either have too much powder or none at all. These papers are just right and if I'm feeling cheap or am not so oily at the moment I tuck the paper in the back to the pouch and use it again. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline ashbrook

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite blotting paper - used another brand - but these are A +.
customer_reviews.author: Karolyn L.

customer_reviews.title: Works, but not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Honestly it feels more like a regular (albiet thin) piece of paper to me. Drugstore brands work just as well for so much less....
customer_reviews.author: Pen

customer_reviews.title: Annoying case
customer_reviews.text: The powder is nice, but I see little difference between the performance of these papers and less expensive brands. Plus, the case is not as functional as I'd like. It's s very soft and very supple plastic, which gives little protection to the sheets and is easily caught and bent back during removal and replacement in your purse. They're not actually good at containing the sheets either. I had to keep my pack in one of the pockets of my purse. Not a huge inconvenience, but it just didn't make any sense not to provide a more functional case.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy P

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Shine Control!
customer_reviews.text: These really work! I have been using these for a long time and they are my secret beauty weapon! When fully made up, you can use these papers to blot excess oil--I have very oily skin--and your skin and make up instantly change from shiny to clean and fresh. Instantly freshens up your skin and make up. If you have very oily skin, these are a life saver!--wish I had them during my teens--would have saved me a lot of embarrasment!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Style

customer_reviews.title: Will change your life! Miracle product.
customer_reviews.text: Shiseido blotting paper is more than oil control. You don't just have less oil after you blot, you look like you've just re-done all your make-up from scratch. It's amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Oil-Control Blotting Paper by Shiseido for Unisex - 100 sheets Blotting Paper
product_meta.description: Pureness oil control blotting paper by Shiseido for unisex 100 sheets blotting paper. Pureness oil control blotting paper was launched by the design house of Shiseido. It is recommended for normal skin.
feature_bullets: helps keep your skin clean and fresh, instantly absorbs oil

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
